00040     public int compare(Entry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>> A, Entry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>> B) {
00041 
00046         double distanceA=(Double) A.getKey().get("Distance");
00050         double distanceB=(Double) B.getKey().get("Distance");
00051         if( distanceA > distanceB ) {
00052             return 1;
00053         }
00054         else if ( distanceA == distanceB ) {
00055             return 0;
00056         }
00057         else {
00058             return -1;

00072     public static void calculateDistance(LinkedList<Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>> documentSet, Map<String, Double> query) {
00073         
00074         Map<String,Double> currentHistogram;
00075         Set<String> intersection;
00081         for(Entry<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Double>> currentDocument : documentSet ) {
00082             
00083             double sum=0.0;
00084             currentHistogram=currentDocument.getValue();
00092             intersection=new HashSet<String>();
00093             intersection.addAll(currentHistogram.keySet());
00094             intersection.retainAll(query.keySet());
00095             for ( String Token : intersection ) {
00096                 sum = sum + (Math.sqrt(query.get(Token) * currentHistogram.get(Token)));
00097             }
00098             currentDocument.getKey().put("Distance", new Double(Math.sqrt(1-sum)));
00099         }
00100     }
